title: The Cop and the anthem
creator_credit: Learning Corporation of America, Terry Benes and Peter Mark Schifter
brief_description: Soapy (played by Robert Morse), an affable vagrant in New York City at the turn of the century tries many ways to get himself put into jail for the winter. A classic tale of irony and pathos. Based on the short story by O. Henry.
